actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

official_title: A bill to prohibit a suspension of the Act of March 3, 1931 (commonly known as the Davis-Bacon Act) in the State of Hawaii.

summary.text: Hawaii Fair Wage Act of 1993 - Prohibits the President from suspending the provisions of the Davis-Bacon Act within the State of Hawaii in response to the national emergency caused by Hurricane Iniki in September 1992. Directs the President to amend a specified Proclamation (relating to the suspension of the Davis-Bacon Act within a limited geographic area in response to the national emergency caused by Hurricanes Andrew and Iniki) to eliminate all references to the State of Hawaii and Hurricane Iniki.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit a suspension of the Act of March 3, 1931 (commonly known as the Davis-Bacon Act) in the State of Hawaii.
